bea1: ^[wave]Yippee![/] I can make my words [shake]shake[/] and [wheel]swirl![/] Isn't that cool [c_pp_blue]Pepper[/]?

bea2: ^Oh, you're back!  And I'm simply brimming with energy this time!  Woo hoo, evenings!

^People and local businesses would bring all kinds of goodies, there'd be games and music and all kinds of festivities!
